content: eyelet pattern section row 23 & 25 same as row 19 pm 10 sts in from either edge to demarcate the garter row 27 same as row 1 border before beginning eyelet pattern section for charted instruction of row 1-28 see pattern chart end with a ws row repeat these 28 row a further 7 times or however many as desired then repeat row 1-14 once row 1 rs knit to end sm as you encounter them ending with a ws row remove mkrs as you work the row 2 and all ws row knit to first mkr sm purl to last row 2nd mkr sm knit to end second garter section row 3 knit to first mkr sm k14 yo k2tog k10 to 3 knit 15 row bobble knitwise sts before 2nd mkr k3 sm knit to end row 5 knit to first mkr sm k12 skp yo k1 yo k2tog finishing k7 to 5 sts before 2nd mkr k5 sm knit to end weave in ends with tapestry needle wet block to row 7 knit to first mkr sm k11 skp yo k3 yo k2tog measurements k5 to 6 sts before 2nd mkr k6 sm knit to end pattern chart condensed key note number in square indicates st count of the corresponding group of knit sts copyright © 2020 by vicky chan all rights reserved v250502 reproduction of this pattern for distribution or sale as well as the sale or commercial use of items made from this pattern are prohibited without the express consent of the designer
